title: Sample Book, 1939
medium:
Medium: cardboard, paper, silk, rayon
Technique: printed
description: Sample book with gray cloth-covered cardboard binding printed in yellow: Imported Prints, Silks – Taffetas – Novelty Fabrics. Spring and summer 1939. Dress-rayons: 26 crinkle crepes; 169 flat crepes; 36 sheers; 18 novelty crepes; 3 bengalines; 4 silk twills; 3 silk taffetas; solid colored fabrics – 32 silk novelties; 6 silk and silk jerseys; 95 silk taffetas; Plaids – 12 silk taffeta plaids; 2 rayon plaids; compounds – 4 silk compound taffetas.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sample Book, 1939.
1939. Medium: cardboard, paper, silk, rayon
Technique: printed. Gift of William Hardy, Inc.. 1939-61-9.
